1.name: yossi shitrit
1.description: Chef Yossi Shitrit has been living and breathing his culinary dreams for more than two decades, including running the kitchen in his first restaurant, the fondly-remembered Violet, located in Moshav Udim. Shitrit's creativity and culinary acumen born of long experience are expressed in the every detail of each and every dish.

2.name: asaf granit

Shitrit's creativity and culinary acumen born of long experience are expressed in the every detail of each and every dish.
